dict.acceptation: 图书馆，藏书楼；藏书；书屋，书斋；图书出租处；

sent.orig: Concepts of e-Business, e-Marketing, e-Government, e-Management, e-Home, e-Library, e-learning, etc. are becoming popular through the world.
sent.trans: e-Business、e-Marketing、e-Government、e-Management、e-Home、e-Library、e-Learn-ing等概念正在全世界范围内迅速流行。

sent.orig: Digital library is the higher phase of library automatization development and represents the library's future.
sent.trans: 数字图书馆是图书馆自动化发展的高级阶段，代表着图书馆的未来。

sent.orig: Library card management, including applications for cancellation of library card inquiries, such as library card holders.
sent.trans: —借书证管理，包括申请、注销借书证，查询借书证持有人等。—借还图书、资料的登记、超期处理，超期拒借等。

sent.orig: Information construction in library, which is the base of digital library, is mainly library holdings.
sent.trans: 图书馆信息资源建设主要是解决数字化馆藏，是数字图书馆的基础。

sent.orig: Its main library, the Dag Hammarskjold Library, is at its HQ in New York.
sent.trans: 联合国的主要图书馆是戴格·哈玛斯卡约德图书馆，位于纽约的联合国总部内。
